resources.string: Idiomatic allows you to translate expressions and see them in their context.
You need to write something in the search bar if you want me to translate it.
No result \nAre you sure this/these word(s) exist(s)?

Design: Florent Crivello
Code: Elodie Ferrais
Translations from Linguee

We've crafted Idiomatic with love, solely motivated by the use we would ourselves make of it (plus the fortune and glory) . Because like you, we've often found myself in situations where translating a single word wasn't enough.

We did our very best - because we love you, dear user - but if you have any comment to make about Idiomatic, feel free to drop us an email at the address elodie.ferrais@gmail.com (or using the button below).
